CustomField.description: Time from "Intro to PK" to "Client Scheduled Initial Call"
CustomField.formula: IF( ISPICKVAL( Plan_Type__c, "Conversion Plan"), Koncierge_Initial_Call_Scheduled__c - Intro_to_K_oncierge__c, 0 )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Time from "Intro to PK" to "Client Scheduled Initial Call"
CustomField.label: Time To Intro Sched Conv
